Drag and Drop it to the box below
Hello blank fragment Drop your choice here
Help HELP! TAP TO CLOSE
HOW? Press and hold on your selection and drag it to the drop box to proceed to the options screen!
WHERE? Choose your farm location and drag your selection to the drop box.
Add Pig Select this option to add another pig and give its details to the list.
Feed Pig Select this option to determine what type and amount of feed is to be given to the pigs.
Medicate Pig Select this option to indicate the type and amount of medicine to be given to the pigs.
View list of pigs Select this option to view the list of existing pigs. The details of the pigs are also shown.
Upload to Server Upload the data to the server. Use this to update the server with new information. *Some options may not be available depending on chosen function.
WHO? Choose the father of this pig. Choose the mother of this pig. Choose a foster parent for this pig
What kind? Choose the breed of this pig, make sure it matches with the breed of the parents!
Edit Inputs Before Adding Tap on the Edit icon beside ? to open the dialogue box Tap on a particular item you want to edit
Welcome to PHPork Farm Traceability App This tutorial will help you learn the basics when using the App How To Use(1/3) How To Use(2/3) How To Use(3/3) Need additional help? Let us Get Started! Touch and drag your choice and drop it to the green box below When dropped, the app will go to the next page When the arrows are present, just tap them or you can swipe to the left or right to explore more choices Just tap on the ? icon located at the right of the toolbar if present" To review again just tap on the PREVIOUS button or tap Go! to start using the app
